verbose_text: This study was primarily focused on the assessment of tested extracts in induced liver fibrosis in animal model, more investigations are required for more understanding of the molecular mechanisms by which AES and DIO each alone or in low-dose combination might exert their beneficial hepatoprotective effect such as their effects on the inhibition of cytochrome CYP2E1 activity.
evidence: AES and DIO each alone or in low-dose combination might exert their beneficial hepatoprotective effect such as their effects on the inhibition of cytochrome CYP2E1
